mapper.insert: insert into CD_WED_CATEGORY (ID_WEDDING_HALL, CD_CATEGORY, DS_CATEGORY, NO_ORDER, ID_REF) values (#{idWeddingHall,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cdCategory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dsCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{idRef,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select ID_WEDDING_HALL, CD_CATEGORY, DS_CATEGORY, NO_ORDER, ID_REF from CD_WED_CATEGORY
